description: Detects Judgement Panda activity as described in Global Threat Report 2019 by Crowdstrike Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Judgement Panda Exfil Activity
query: (process.command_line:*eprod.ldf OR process.command_line:(*\\ldifde.exe\ \-f\ \-n\ * OR *\\7za.exe\ a\ 1.7z\ * OR *\\aaaa\\procdump64.exe* OR *\\aaaa\\netsess.exe* OR *\\aaaa\\7za.exe* OR *copy\ .\\1.7z\ \\* OR *copy\ \\client\\c$\\aaaa\\*) OR process.executable:"C\:\\Users\\Public\\7za.exe")
